Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav's half century (58 off 26 balls)
For Sri Lanka, Matheesha Pathirana clicked Four wickets
Despite Pathum Nissanka's 79 off 48 balls and Kusal Mendis's 45 of 27 balls, Sri Lanka's entire innings collapsed at 170 runs in 19.2 overs
Pre-Game Insights: Suryakumar Yadav will take charge of the 3 match T20 series against Sri Lanka starting today at Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, Pallekele
Notably, Surya has big shoes to fill in leading the world champions and taking over the charge of team after the retirement of skipper Rohit Sharma
Meanwhile, coach Gautam Gambhir will also be keenly looking forward to starting on a positive note with a dominating effort against a full-strength Sri Lankan side
He will also have a major responsibility in leading the rebuilding effort in T20Is after the retirement of veterans like Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli and Ravindra Jadeja
Focus will also be on Shubman Gill who has now been elevated to the post of vice-captain after an impressive outing as a skipper in the recently concluded Zimbabwe series
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is India highest T20I score in Sri Lanka
